3.2 About the DUIM-OLE-Server library

3.2.3 A note about compound document container applications and DUIM

We do not encourage writing compound document container applications with the present Functional Developer OLE/COM API libraries, whether or not they are written in DUIM. You are free to try, but we cannot guarantee success.

OLE, COM, ActiveX and DBMS Reference - 31 MAR 2000
